name: tm06
effect: Teaches Toxic to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Toxic to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from special attacks for five turns.
